title: ORISUN Cape Town - November 16th
description:
Experience the authentic flavors of Nigeria in the heart of Cape Town. Chef Derin presents ORISUN - a culinary journey that celebrates the rich heritage and modern innovation of Nigerian cuisine.

This intimate dining experience features a carefully curated 7-course tasting menu, showcasing traditional Nigerian ingredients elevated through contemporary techniques.
menuPreview:
7-Course Tasting Menu Preview

  • Amuse-Bouche: Plantain & Palm Wine Reduction
  • First Course: Pepper Soup Consommé with Catfish
  • Second Course: Jollof Rice Risotto with Tiger Prawns
  • Third Course: Suya-Spiced Lamb with Yam Purée
  • Fourth Course: Egusi Foam with Stockfish
  • Fifth Course: Pounded Yam Gnocchi
  • Dessert: Coconut & Hibiscus Parfait
cancellationPolicy:
Cancellation Policy:

  • Full refund: 7+ days before event
  • 50% refund: 3-6 days before event
  • No refund: Less than 3 days before event
requirements: Please inform us of any dietary restrictions or allergies when booking.
seoTitle: ORISUN Cape Town - November 16th | Authentic Nigerian Fine Dining
seoDescription: Join Chef Derin for an unforgettable Nigerian fine dining experience in Cape Town. 7-course tasting menu featuring traditional flavors with modern techniques.

title: ORISUN Cape Town - November 22nd
description:
The second Cape Town edition of ORISUN dining experience. Due to popular demand, we're hosting another intimate evening celebrating Nigerian culinary excellence.

This exclusive dinner features the same exceptional 7-course menu with slight seasonal variations to showcase the best of November's ingredients.
menuPreview:
7-Course Tasting Menu Preview

  • Amuse-Bouche: Plantain & Palm Wine Reduction

  • Second Course: Jollof Rice Risotto with Tiger Prawns
  • Third Course: Suya-Spiced Lamb with Yam Purée
  • Fourth Course: Egusi Foam with Stockfish
  • Fifth Course: Pounded Yam Gnocchi
  • Dessert: Coconut & Hibiscus Parfait
cancellationPolicy:

  • Full refund: 7+ days before event
  • 50% refund: 3-6 days before event
  • No refund: Less than 3 days before event
requirements: Please inform us of any dietary restrictions or allergies when booking.
seoTitle: ORISUN Cape Town - November 22nd | Authentic Nigerian Fine Dining
seoDescription: Second Cape Town edition of ORISUN dining experience. Join Chef Derin for exceptional Nigerian cuisine in an intimate setting.

title: ORISUN Lagos - December 11th
description:
ORISUN returns home to Lagos! Experience Chef Derin's culinary mastery in the vibrant heart of Nigeria, where traditional flavors meet contemporary innovation.

This homecoming celebration features an expanded 8-course menu, incorporating the finest local ingredients and time-honored family recipes.
menuPreview:
8-Course Homecoming Menu Preview

  • Welcome: Palm Wine & Kola Nut Ceremony
  • Amuse-Bouche: Plantain & Scotch Bonnet Emulsion
  • First Course: Native Pepper Soup with Fresh Fish
  • Second Course: Jollof Rice Pearls with Prawns
  • Third Course: Asun-Spiced Goat with Plantain
  • Fourth Course: Egusi Sphere with Stockfish
  • Fifth Course: Pounded Yam Clouds
  • Dessert: Agbalumo & Coconut Delight
dressCode: Traditional Nigerian Attire or Formal Wear
cancellationPolicy:
Cancellation Policy:

  • Full refund: 7+ days before event
  • 50% refund: 3-6 days before event
  • No refund: Less than 3 days before event
requirements: Please inform us of any dietary restrictions. Traditional attire is encouraged but not required.
seoTitle: ORISUN Lagos - December 11th | Nigerian Fine Dining Homecoming
seoDescription: ORISUN returns to Lagos! Join Chef Derin for an authentic Nigerian fine dining experience featuring traditional flavors and modern techniques.

title: ORISUN Lagos - December 21st
description:
Pre-Christmas celebration with ORISUN! A special holiday edition featuring festive Nigerian flavors and seasonal ingredients.

This unique dining experience combines traditional Christmas elements with authentic Nigerian cuisine, creating unforgettable holiday memories.
menuPreview:
Holiday Edition 8-Course Menu

  • Welcome: Zobo & Ginger Cocktail
  • Amuse-Bouche: Chin Chin Crumble with Pepper Sauce
  • First Course: Festive Pepper Soup with Turkey
  • Second Course: Coconut Rice with Prawns
  • Third Course: Christmas Goat Pepper Soup
  • Fourth Course: Holiday Jollof with Chicken
  • Fifth Course: Moi Moi Soufflé
  • Dessert: Puff Puff & Ice Cream Parfait
dressCode: Festive Attire or Traditional Nigerian Wear
cancellationPolicy:
Cancellation Policy:

  • Full refund: 7+ days before event
  • 50% refund: 3-6 days before event
  • No refund: Less than 3 days before event
requirements: Please inform us of any dietary restrictions. Festive attire encouraged!
seoTitle: ORISUN Lagos - December 21st | Holiday Nigerian Fine Dining
seoDescription: Pre-Christmas ORISUN dining experience in Lagos. Celebrate the holidays with authentic Nigerian flavors and festive atmosphere.

title: ORISUN Lagos - December 28th
description:
End the year with ORISUN! Our final dining experience of 2024 celebrates the journey we've taken and looks forward to new culinary adventures.

This year-end celebration features our signature menu with special additions, creating the perfect finale to an incredible year of Nigerian culinary excellence.
menuPreview:
Year-End Celebration Menu

  • Welcome: Champagne & Hibiscus Toast
  • Amuse-Bouche: Plantain Caviar
  • First Course: Celebration Pepper Soup
  • Second Course: Golden Jollof with Lobster
  • Third Course: Premium Suya Selection
  • Fourth Course: Egusi Royal with King Fish
  • Fifth Course: Pounded Yam Perfection
  • Dessert: New Year's Coconut Dreams
cancellationPolicy:
Cancellation Policy:

  • Full refund: 7+ days before event
  • 50% refund: 3-6 days before event
  • No refund: Less than 3 days before event
requirements: Please inform us of any dietary restrictions. This is our year-end celebration!
seoTitle: ORISUN Lagos - December 28th | Year-End Nigerian Fine Dining Celebration
seoDescription: End 2024 with ORISUN's final dining experience. Join Chef Derin for a year-end celebration of Nigerian culinary excellence.
